property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your Light cards put into your hand from your shields gets 'shield trigger'. While you have no shields, this creature has 'blocker'. Triple breaker When this creature would leave the battle zone, you may have your opponent choose one of your shields instead. If you do, put that shield into your hand. (You can use the 'shield trigger' ability of that shield.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker Whenever this creature attacks, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less. Each turn, when this creature becomes tapped for the first time, untap it. While battling, this creature gets +1000 power for each fire card in your graveyard. Triple breaker

card.name: Kiriko Cubic, First Model Dragon Emperor

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your water Dragons. When you put this creature into the battle zone, put your hand on the bottom of your deck in any order. Then, reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal 3 spells. Shuffle all other revealed cards into your deck, then cast those 3 spells for no cost. Triple breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your darkness Dragons. When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all creatures except darkness creatures. Then each player puts all non-darkness cards in his mana zone into his graveyard. Triple breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a non-evolution nature creature from your hand into the battle zone. Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks, it attacks this creature if able. Triple breaker

card.name: Alcadeias D, Lord of Dragon Spirits

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your light Dragons. Triple breaker Players can't cast spells other than light spells.

card.name: Bell Hell De Linne, Footprint Demon Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your opponent's creatures is destroyed, shuffle your deck. Then reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a non-evolution Dragon, put it into the battle zone. If it's not, your opponent chooses and discards a card from his hand. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature equipped with this attacks, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it. Dragsolution: At the end of your turn, if the equipped creature is tapped, flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it. (At the start of your game, draghearts are put into your hyperspatial zone. If a creature equipped with it or the dragheart leaves the battle zone, return it there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} Whenever this creature attacks or blocks or leaves the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. From among it, you may take a water spell that costs 4 or less, shuffle your deck and cast that spell for no cost. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, discard a card from your opponent's hand at random. Then you may put a darkness creature that costs less than the discarded card from your graveyard into the battle zone. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your fire Dragons. Whenever your opponent chooses this creature, he chooses 3 cards in his mana zone and puts the rest into his graveyard. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your nature Dragons. When you put this creature into the battle zone or whenever this creature attacks, you may put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, for each of your Dragons in the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

card.name: Bg Newton Custom Panzer, Dragment Symbol

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your opponent draws cards, you may draw the same number of cards. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your creatures in the battle zone and put it into your mana zone. Then, your opponent chooses one of his creatures in the battle zone and puts it into his mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your other Dragons in the battle zone gets +4000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may take a Dragon, a non-Dragon creature and a spell and put them into your hand. Put the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy one of your creatures. If you do, draw a card. Slayer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your other dragons in the battle zone can attack untapped creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature or one of your other Dragons would be destroyed, you may put them into your mana zone instead.
